ygData.subject: Re: Evil Races
ygData.msgSnippet: Skel, There is a halfling camp just inside the nektulos zone along the left border of the zone.  Its been a LONG time since I ve hunted them but I think you
ygData.messageBody:
Skel,

There is a halfling camp just inside the nektulos zone along the left border
of the zone. Its been a LONG time since I've hunted them but I think you
should be fine from the low to mid teens and up.

Grymspine Mael'fesience
Bored, frustrated, and disenchanted level 29 DE necromancer who is still
looking for the words necessary to make vampiric curse
